block.p: GETZ-George, ''Cy'', of White Plains, NY, died on June 28, 2000, at the age of 94. Brilliant teacher, scholar and author, kind and gentle man. Beloved husband and best friend of Ruth for 66 years. Adoring and adored father of Nancy and Mitchell Wollman, and Marcia and Donald Gerber. Cherished grandfather of Jeffrey, Richard and Daniel Wollman, and Susan and Andrew Gerber. Proud great-grandfather of Kaidy, Erika, Ross, Joanna, Caroline & Tayler. Services are private.
